name: kafka-connect-http
title: Kafka Connect HTTP
description: Kafka Connect connector that enables Change Data Capture from JSON/HTTP APIs into Kafka.

support.summary:
Cástor Rodríguez supports the HTTP plugin alongside other contributors of
this open source project.

requirements: HTTP resource to perform requests against

To perform change-data-capture with effectively-once delivery
                                            guarantees, the HTTP resource should allow ordering and filtering by one or
                                            more monotonically increasing properties such as sequence numbers or
                                            timestamps
